com.compendium.core.db
Class DBClone

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBClone

public class DBClone
extends java.lang.Object

THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBClone class serves as the interface layer to the Clones table in the database

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DELETE_CLONE_QUERY
          a particular Clone for a node in a view is being deleted
static java.lang.String DELETE_PARENTNODE_QUERY
          the parent node is being deleted, hence all the clone entries have to be removed
static java.lang.String GET_CLONE_QUERY
          the particular clone for the given parent node is retrieved
static java.lang.String GET_CLONES_QUERY
          all the clones for the given parent node are retrieved
static java.lang.String INSERT_CLONE_QUERY
          a particular Clone for a node in a view is being inserted
 
Constructor Summary
DBClone()
           
 
Method Summary
static boolean deleteClone(DBConnection dbcon, java.lang.String parentId, java.lang.String childId)
          Deletes the clone for the given parent node and returns true if successful
static boolean deleteParentNode(DBConnection dbcon, java.lang.String parentId)
          Deletes the parent node with the given nodeId with all the clone entries from the table and returns true if successful
static NodeSummary getClone(DBConnection dbcon, java.lang.String parentId, java.lang.String childId, java.lang.String userID)
          Retrieve the particular clone of a particular parent node the return value is the Clone object (NodeSummary for the Clone object) returns null if there are no entries for the parent node in the table.
static java.util.Enumeration getClones(DBConnection dbcon, java.lang.String parentId, java.lang.String userID)
          Retrieve all the clones of a particular parent node the return value is an enumeration of Clone objects (NodeSummaries for the Clone objects) returns null if there are no entries for the parent node in the table.
static boolean insert(DBConnection dbcon, java.lang.String parentId, java.lang.String childId)
          Inserts a new clone for the parent node in the database and returns true if successful.
